attributes.action: Make The Stig a key Male figure in British Society and therefore a role model for marriage material
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I believe the Stig from Top Gear is a gentalman who is a role model to all males. He is perfect marriage material as he partakes in manley sports i.e racing. He is a gentleman who is eligable and is, to be quite honest, top draw. He enjoys whittisisms and long walks on the beach. I full on love the stig, and Richard Hammond.. but my boyfriend whouldn't let me start a petition about him.. gutted :(

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
